title: "Tidying data"
format: html

Setup

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)


#model functions
source("src/model_functions.R")



```


Make repo structure

```{r}

create_repo(this_path = here())


```



Make input and output folder structure for species of interest

```{r}


species <- c("atlantic_salmon", 
             "general_salmonid", 
             "european_seabass", 
             "gilthead_seabream", 
             "large_yellow_croaker", 
             "japanese_seabass",
             "japanese_amberjack",
             "general_grouper",
             "pompano",
             "milkfish")


#deploy data folder structure for species 

map(species, create_species_folders)


 



```
